mapper.select: SELECT A.product_id productId, A.nm_kor nmKor, A.nm_eng nmEng, A.price, A.pic, A.promotion, A.beginner, A.alcohol, A.quantity , B.nm categoryNm, B.temp , C.nm countryNm , D.sweety, D.acidity, D.body , E.flower, E.plant, E.fruit, E.spicy, E.earth, E.oak, E.nuts FROM t_product A INNER JOIN t_category B ON A.category_id = B.category_id INNER JOIN t_country C ON A.country_id = C.country_id INNER JOIN t_feature D ON A.feature_id = D.feature_id INNER JOIN t_aroma E ON A.aroma_id = E.aroma_id WHERE A.product_id=#{productId}

SELECT C.s_kind sKind FROM t_product A INNER JOIN t_wine_pairing B ON A.product_id=B.product_id INNER JOIN t_small_category C ON B.small_category_id=C.small_category_id WHERE A.product_id=#{productId};
SELECT count(A.review_level) reviewCount FROM t_review A INNER JOIN t_order_product B ON A.order_product_id = B.order_product_id WHERE B.product_id=#{productId} AND review_level=#{reviewLevel}
SELECT B.sale, B.sale_price salePrice FROM t_product A INNER JOIN t_sale B ON A.product_id = B.product_id WHERE A.product_id=#{productId};
